title: Rahu Transit in the 6th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the 6th house for Taurus Ascendant intensifies focus on competition, problem-solving, and overcoming obstacles. This phase sharpens strategic thinking and the desire to dominate challenges, rivals, or difficult circumstances. Work environments may feel politically charged, demanding alertness and adaptability. Health routines require conscious regulation, especially stress and lifestyle habits. While Rahu boosts the ability to defeat opposition through unconventional methods, imbalance or obsession can create burnout. Disciplined strategy converts pressure into decisive advantage.
closing: Rahu in the 6th house sharpens survival instincts and competitive edge. Discipline and ethics transform relentless pressure into sustainable victory.
